runs.comm: off the mark with a slash over point, Bond slips that in just a little wide and the sweeper cuts it off
full and wide, Jayasuriya gets a thick outside edge the ball goes flying to third man, one bounce over the ropes, despairign dive by the fielder
better line, outside the off stump and left alone
wide outside off, slashed over point and it's square, the fielder at the deep cant get to it
good length outside off, Jayasuriya has a feel at it, lets it go through to the keeper
full and on the legs, pushed to mid-on
fullish and outside the off stump, punched back towards the bowler
short of a good length and outside the off, defended to the off side with soft hands for a quick single
short ball banged in, Jayasuriya helps that around the corner with no difficulty whatosever, that's four from the moment it left the bat
another one fetched from outside the off, this time hit in front of square, just the single as there's a fielder there
short of a driving length and on the stumps, played tentatively at and missed, struck on the pad
fullish and outside the off, Jayasuriya waits on the ball and does not try to hit it hard. Instead he threads it into the gap in front of point and has timed it well enough for it to go all the way
fullish and on the off, Tharanga launches that over mid-on but has not hit the ball too well, a couple of runs as the fielder tidies up
short of a good length and outside the off, Tharanga gives himself a bit more room and carves the ball through cover. Lovely shot for four
pushed into the off side for a single
full and outside the off, Jayasuriya gets his weight behind the ball and launches it over mid-off, that is a cracking hit
overpitched and on the pads, the bowler over-compensating here, Jayasuriya goes right back and whips the ball over square-leg, another boundary
short of a good length and outside the off, chopped down to short third-man
down the wicket and bang! Tharanga taking chances here and getting away with it. This one is carved over the infield and has plenty on it. That one lands on the ropes and it's six!
down the wicket and this time Martin follows Tharanga and bounces him. The batsman does well to get out of the way of that one. Good comeback from the bowler
another short one banged in, good pace as well, just outside the off, played at and missed, through to the keeper
short of a good length and outside the off, played down towards cover
full and on the pads, attempted yorker, flick played and missed, rapped on the pad
full and straight, hit back down the pitch, Martin half stops that, the batsmen pinch a cheeky single
short of a length and outside the off, Tharanga moves towards leg and tries to hammer the ball over the off side, too quick and he misses, through to the keeper
short one banged in, Tharanga plays a pull shot, it's not terribly well hit but it's super effective, the ball sails high, wide and handsome into the stands over deep backward square-leg
fullish and outside the off, again Tharanga gives himself room and tries to hit over the off side, again he misses
fullish and on the off, more authentic a cricket shot this time, powered past mid-off and that brings up the 50 in real quick time
another swipe, this time Tharanga gets hold of a length ball, not terribly well, and it's saved on the ropes at cover
quick ball outside the off, that was express pace, Jayasuriya tries to heave the ball over the leg side and misses
full and on the stumps, Tharanga gets hold of this alright and clouts it over midwicket. Tharangha going after everything that's bowled at him
fullish and down the leg side, flick played and missed, off the pads to the on side
short of a length and on the stumps, Jayasuriya moves to leg and chops the ball to the off side
good-length ball on the stumps, driven down to long-on
full and speared in on the pads, Jayasuriya tries to heave the ball over the leg side but misses and is struck on the boot
very full and on the stumps, well dug out but no chance of a run as point fields
low full-toss on the pads, Tharanga swats that ball down the ground towards long-on
Bang! short one banged in, Jayasuriya picks up the line and length very very early. Short-arm pull hit so well it goes all the way for six
Repeat! Another short one and again Jayasuriya swivels and sends the ball flat and powerfully into the stands
fullish and on the off, Jayasuriya goes straight back over the bowler's head this time, he gets under the ball too much and it goes high up in the air, Bond runs, dives but can't quite get to it

fullish and on the stumps once more, this time Jayasuriya just chips the ball to mid-on, Bonds has a chance to make amends. Simple chance. Bond gets under the ball and somehow manages to drop that sitter! A life for Jayasuriya who was cursing himself and beginning to walk away
full and down the leg side, flicked and missed, wide called
worked away through the leg side, more runs, this is looking very difficult for New Zealand
short of a length and on the pads, worked through midwicket for runs
full and quite straight, defended back down the stumps
tossed up, on the stumps, Tharanga tries to hit this one right out of the ground. He gets the elevation but not the distance. This time it's Martin under the catch at long-off and he takes it!
short of a length and on the off, Jayasuriya defends. The ball pops back down the pitch to the off side
short of a length and outside the off, played wide of point for a single
fullish and just drifting down leg, sweep played and missed, rapped on the pad
fullish and outside the off, played awkwardly away towards the off side
fullish and on the off, Sangakkara eases the ball wide of long-off for a single
short of a good length and outside the off, played away in front of point for a single
back of a length and on the off, driven awkwardly back down the pitch
fullish and outside the off, driven well but straight to the fielder at mid-off
short of a driving length and on the off, chopped down to point, end of a tidy over from Styris
full and outside the off stump, driven through cover for yet another single
tossed up and outside the off, Sangakkara plays for the spin and misses
flatter and just outside the off, Sangakkara sweeps, misses and is hit on the pad
short of a length and on the pads, played down to long-on
full and on the pads, swung away down to fine-leg for a single
down the pitch and lofted to long-on but on the bounce
slipping on to the leg side, runs off the pad
full-pitched on the stumps, driven through mid-on
slanting away from Jayasuriya who opens the bat-face and steers to short third man
on the off stump line, pushed to cover point
fuller, straighter, tries to drill through the off side, gets an inside edge to fine leg
floated outside off, full in length, swept through wide mid-on
slightly short in length, outside off, cut to deep point
arm-ball, drifting away from Jayasuriya who can't connect with his cut shot. Lovely delivery, it just drifted away at the last minute
And again, again it curves at the last minute, beats the intended late-cut, McCullum appeals for the stumping, no luck
short of length, on the stumps, turned to backward square leg
full and outside off, driven to long-off
full in length, on the off stump line, driven over mid-on for a boundary
on the off and middle, stays back to push it to cover point
fullish, outside off stump, mistimes a drive through square leg. That's his 3rd Twenty20 international fifty
partnership-breaker Styris strikes. Short in length, pulled straight down the throat of deep square leg
Slower one, Jayawardene picks it up early and smokes it over mid-off
bangs it short, outside off, Jayawardene tries to upper cut but can't reach it
slashed to third man boundary where Bond makes a fine diving stop. Short in length, outside off, Jayasuriya flashes at it and top-edges it to right of third man
full in length, angling away from Jayasuriya who tries to pull it across the line, misses and it runs off the thigh pad
fullish, on the middle and leg, Mahela picks it over midwicket.
lovely cut shot. It was full in length, on the off and middle, Jayawardene backs away a touch and cuts it from the stumps, past point.
shot-a-ball from Mahela continues. Length delivery on the middle stump line and he swings it disdainfully to long leg boundary

fullish, on the off stump line, squeezed through backward point. Fulton rushes to his left from deep point and fires in a throw at McCullum who fumbles while gathering. Had he collected cleanly, Jayawardene would have been run out
full-toss outside off, angling away from Jayasuriya who tries to swing it to the on side but misses
bouncer at the right shoulder, pulled to right of long leg
short in length, on the off stump line, Mahela waits on the ball before cutting it through point. Chris Martin gets across but makes a mess of the sliding stop.
This is turning into a neat little cameo from Mahela. Shot-a-ball. Fullish, on the middle and leg, drilled through wide midwicket
in the zone outside off, Mahela misses an intended drive and McCullum gathers. And suddenly, in a whim, goes for an appeal. No one else supports him.
retains the strike with a square drive
fullish, on the off and middle stump line, square driven past point
a tad short in length, on the off stump line, cut to point
Mahela shapes to paddle sweep and Oram hurls it wider outside off stump, Mahela misses but so does McCullum

banged in short, outside off stump, Jayasuriya can't reach it, McCullum makes a half-stop and the ball rolls behind him. Jayasuriya wants a run, takes a step or two before beign sent back. Wise decision as McCullum had reached it quickly and fired a direct hit at the striker's end
yorker length, outside leg stump, off the pads to the square leg region
That's a biggie! Full in length, on the middle and leg, Jayawardene cleared the front foot and smoked it over deep midwicket. Effortless strike.
from round the stumps, yorker length on the off stump, stabbed back to the bowler
just short of yorker length, homing in on the off stump, Jayasuriya opens his stance up and tries to swipe it across the line, gets an inside-edge on to the pad
driven hard to mid-off, Bond fires in a throw at the non-striker's end but misses and Jayawardene survives
low swinging full toss from round the stumps, Jayasuriya edges it to the pad again.
full again, another swipe across the line doesn't connect and it runs off the pad to the off side
overpitched outside off stump, drilled hard to deep point. That one sped across the turf.
on the middle stump line, fullish, worked behind square leg
jumps down the track and lofts it just over the ropes at the long-on region.
comes down the track again, Vettori fires it short and quick and Jayasuriya pulls it to deep midwicket
slower in the air this time, spun past the off stump, Mahela cuts to deep point
again slow and spinning away, cut to deep point
drifting in on the middle and off, poked to the on side
the scores are level. Full and outside off, driven through point
bouncer, over the middle stump line, sways away
from round the stumps, full and slanted across Chamara Silva who square drives to cover point
yorker length, on the middle and leg stump line, stabbed to midwicket. Chamara Silva is teasing the spectators
Streaky edge through the vacant slip region does the trick. Full and angling across Silva who tries to flash it through cover.
